runs.comm: Beaten first up as it went on straight, played for the turn as he tried to punch it into the off side, missed
around middle and off, pushed away off the back foot into the off side
turning in this time and he's struck on the pads, on the thighs rather as he tried to turn the face
tossed up, he steps out of the crease and creams it towards extra cover where Shafiq dives to his left to save runs, at least a couple
turns it away from round the wicket, angled in around the off and shot away, Kayes poked at that one but was beaten
turned away past square leg for a couple of runs, short of a good length and he whipped it square, Shafiq gave chase
good length on the off and Naeem drives that through the line but straight to mid-off
a touch fuller and Naeem went after that one, tried to slash that hard as it nipped away and missed

trapped in front, wicket number 50 for Gul in Twenty20 cricket says Ramiz Raja on the TV commentary, quick delivery on middle and leg and Naeem tries to flick it square, struck on the pads and it seemed to be in line with the stumps, the umpire didn't take long to raise the finger
goodish length on the off, driven soundly but straight to mid-on
beaten, nipped away, short of a good length and the new man tries to chase it by opening the face, misses
round the wicket on the off, goodish length on the off, defended into the off side towards cover
appeal for lbw, landed on middle and leg and angled in further, Imrul played back to it and was struck on the pads while turning the face, might have been missing leg
pitches outside leg, strikes the pads once again as he tries to turn the face, they sneak a leg-bye
Early trouble for Bangladesh, Hafeez strikes, tossed up on middle and leg, Kapali chips it just wide of midwicket where Misbah takes a good catch, moving to his left
tapped into the off side

drama in the field, Shakib chops that between cover and point, Misbah and Farhat are in a tangle over who's going to field the ball and they both miss it, Farhat eventually gives chase, slides prematurely and then slides again to haul it back in
short of a good length outside off, tries to crack it off the back foot, misses
back of a length on the off, some extra bounce there, Shakib drops it down into the off side
shortish on the off, knocks it down in front of point for a single
edged, goodish length and just a hint of away movement, gets a thick outside edge wide of slip to third man
back of a length on the off, drops it into the off side, some good calling earns them a single
down the leg side, tries to glance it down, Umar Akmal does well diving full length to his right to stop that
shortish outside off, Kayes rooted to the crease and tries to crack that past point, misses, it's called a wide, unfair call, well inside the line
slower offcutter, good length on the off and cuts away, Imrul doesn't quite pick it and it gets to Umar Akmal on the bounce
pushed it full on the off stump, played cautiously towards extra cover
leading edge, angling in towards leg stump, turns away as Shakib closed the face, took the leading edge and landed short of point
pushed towards long-off from the crease for a single
driven towards long-off once again, one more to the score
fullish on the off, goes for the sweep, mistimes it towards short fine leg, just the single
pitched up on the off, defended towards cover, early pressure on Bangladesh
shortish on the off, coming from round the wicket, played towards short third man
shortish outside off, cracked towards cover off the back foot

run-out, goodish length on midlde and off, defended towards point, shoots off for a single after Kayes calls for it, Hafeez was the fielder and he returned an under-arm throw to Umar Akmal who took down the stumps to catch Kayes short
turns in from a good length, Mushfiqur plays it off the back foot and drops it into the off side
Mushfiqur does a good job tackling the bounce, some extra bounce for Ajmal this time and he knocked it down off the back foot
tucked away behind square for a single to keep strike
short outside off, extra bounce again, chopped past point for a single in the deep
Bangladesh in further trouble, quicker through the air from Hafeez and it's a straight one, Shakib moved away to play the cut and missed, losing his off stump in the process, nice variation in pace
turned in from a good length outside off, closed the face on that one and was hit on the pads but outside the line
worked away off the back foot in front of square leg for a single
flighted on the off, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
short outside off, cut away hard but straight to deep point, just the single
pushed into the leg side for a single
tries to cut, beaten and Umar Akmal fumbles
worked away through square leg for a single
short and goes for the pull, doesn't make any contact, struck on the thigh it seemed
some extra bounce for Afridi as well, tapped into the off side
pushed off the back foot towards extra cover, Bangladesh struggling to get a move-on here
Bangladesh are sinking, a wide delivery, short too, Mahmudullah went for the cut and nicked it straight to the keeper, this game's only heading one way
back of a length on the off, punched towards mid-off
shortish outside off, cracked away towards extra cover from the crease
back of a length outside off, tries to slash hard, misses
back of a length and it's a release for Bangladesh as Nasir Hossain swats that down the ground to fetch his team a boundary, his team's first, in the ninth over of the chase
goodish length on the off, defended from the crease into the off side
short, pulled hard but towards deep midwicket, just the single
flighted on the off, pushed past Afridi who fumbles and palms it off wide of long-off, they scramble back for the second
shortish on the off, punched towards extra cover for a single
makes a bit of room and knocks it down to point
turns it away past square leg for a single
back of a length on the off, drops it into the off side in front of point
short of a good length on the off, knocked it down towards point from the crease
short of a good length, slashes it down to a fine third man for a single
played towards point, Mushfiqur wanted the single but was sent back, just in time, as the fielder scored a direct-hit, they get a couple off the ricochet
turned off the back foot wide of square leg for a single
punched wide of Shoaib Malik at deep extra cover for a couple more runs
back of a length on the off, drops it into the off side towards cover
turns it towards short fine leg and they pick a quick single
Umar Gul drops a dolly, lofted it high and it was heading just one way, into the palms of long-off, and he made a mess of it

Run-out, could have also been a catch had it not landed just short of Imran Farhat at short third man as he attempted a reverse-sweep, Mushfiqur had run halfway down the pitch and Nasir Hossain didn't seem interested in the single, Farhat returned a throw to the keeper who took down the bails, Mushfiqur was miles out
good length on middle, gets forward and defends it in front of the bowler
driven through midwicket into the deep for one more
beaten as it turned away from a good length, came forward to defend but was beaten by the turn
Ajmal comes round the wicket, defended into the off side, that was a doosra
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot to knock it into the off side
around the off stump, gets forward and taps it into the leg side
another wide down the leg side, full and he tries to glance it fine, misses
flat on the leg stump, pushed towards midwicket
defended off the back foot towards midwicket from the crease
gets on the back foot, turned towards midwicket
gets on the back foot, punches it wristily wide of long-on for a couple of runs
four leg-byes, fullish but down the leg side from over the wicket, tried to glance it down, deflected off the pads to the fine-leg boundary
short, pulled away over midwicket for a couple into the deep, wide of long-on

trapped in front, fires in a quick delivery in front of off and middle and he was just too late in bringing his bat down, beaten for pace, the umpire raised his finger just as Afridi went up for the appeal
full toss outside off, pushed towards deep cover for a single
tried to drive it off the back foot, got an inside edge, rolled to slip
round the wicket, turned away as he bowled it flat, some extra bounce as well, missed as he went for the cut
pushed off the back foot through point and cover for a single
came down the track to strike him over his head but ended up getting a thick outside edge, cut off by a third man in the deep
played back towards the bowler
worked off the back foot wide of midwicket
gets an inside edge, was a flattish delivery outside off and he tried to swing it over midwicket, the inside edge just evaded the off stump and beat short fine leg to the ropes
shortish on the off, tapped in front of square leg for a single
short and wide, goes for the cut but cannot make contact
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and plays it back to the bowler
goodish length on the off, played towards mid-off for a single, Malik aims and misses, would not have mattered as he was home
pushed off the back foot towards point, a touch wider this time from Tanvir
banged in short and it's dealt with harshly, fetches it from outside off and dispatches it between long-on and deep midwicket
gets on the back foot, angles in from round the wicket, punched just wide of long-on for a couple

Afridi takes a well-judged catch at deep midwicket and strikes a pose, slog-swept by Razzak but didn't get it off the middle, plenty of elevation and Afridi ran a fair distance to his right, his eyes on the ball throughout, and took a neat catch diving to his right
gets on the back foot to play it behind square for a single

given out lbw, landed on a good length and it turned in, Shafiul got a stride out and tried to defend, it spun in to strike him on the pads, seemed to be going on to hit the stumps but the only doubt was whether he was struck outside the line, a replay will help us find out. Yes, he was struck outside the line
gets on the back foot and defends
gets an inside edge as he tries to play the cut
short of a good length outside off, cracks it wide of deep point for a couple of runs
shortish on leg stump, turned wide of fine leg for a couple more
back of a length on middle, played towards midwicket off the back foot
angling in towards leg stump, clipped through square leg for a single
bowls it full on middle, digs it out into the off side
shortish outside off, tries to cut it past point, misses
turning in from outside off, gets outside the line to defend, is struck on the pads
turning down the leg side, tried to play it fine but missed, called a wide
shortish outside off, turning in sharply, goes for the cut and misses, it didn't miss the off stump by much
worked away towards square leg off the back foot
flighted outside off, driven straight back towards the bowler
appeared to go on straight, tried to drive it but played inside the line to that one
pushed wide of point for a single
Some joy for the crowd as Nasir deposits that short delivery into the crowd behind deep midwicket, pulled powerfully
turning in from outside off, pushed towards extra cover
gets on the back foot and taps it gently in front of short fine leg
shortish on the off, punched off the back foot to mid-off
flighted outside off, driven towards extra cover for a single
fires it quick on middle, defended gently back to the bowler
